title: Warlords II for DOS
material_description: Floppy disk videogame. Two 3 1/2 inch floppy disks, registration card, subscription card, catalogue, advert, reply paid envelope and manual in cardboard box
brief_description: Warlords II refines on the formula that made the previous game so successful. New to the game is the addition of “fog of war”, where enemy units may be concealed from the map if a player’s own units are not close enough to see them. The interface and graphics have been upgraded and a suite of tools have been added to facilitate its multiplayer experience. This include a play by e-mail feature, a random map generator and a map editor.
